to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.model

Class RotateCameraMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.model.Message
      • to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.model.RotateCameraMessage

  • public class RotateCameraMessage
extends Message
    Rotate the camera (if supported). This Message is send to the host. The instances of this class are immutable.
    Author:
    sven

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      float pan
      Pan the camera (horizontal rotate).
      float tilt
      Tilt the camera (vertical rotate).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • pan

        public final float pan
        Pan the camera (horizontal rotate). Possible values (in degree) depending on FeatureMessage.cameraPanMin and FeatureMessage.cameraPanMax. 0 degree is looking forward. If only tilt is supported, this value should be 0.

      • tilt

        public final float tilt
        Tilt the camera (vertical rotate). Possible values (in degree) depending on FeatureMessage.cameraTiltMin and FeatureMessage.cameraTiltMax. 0 degree is looking forward. If only pan is supported, this value should be 0.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RotateCameraMessage

        public RotateCameraMessage(float pan,
                   float tilt)
        Creates a new instance of RotateCameraMessage.
        Parameters:
        pan - pan
        tilt - tilt
